nodes.text: Cord Barzon was male Human who is the son of Carl Barzon. After the death of Cord's mother, his father was the only family member.

Cord was captured by Imperial soldiers and arrested for suspected affiliation with the New Republic, although no formal charges were ever given for his arrest. Carl was told that Cord had been conscripted into military service, but he was never seen again. Cord was reported killed after his arrest.
